summary: DT*: THE CONTACT STATED AS THE DRIVER WAS TURNING INTO A PARKING SPACE AT 5 MPH; THE DRIVER'S FOOT WAS ON THE BRAKE WHEN THE VEHICLE ACCELERATED ON ITS OWN HITTING A TREE.  THERE WAS EXTENSIVE DAMAGE DONE TO THE VEHICLE.  THIS ALSO OCCURRED ONE OTHER TIME IN JANUARY.  THE VEHICLE ACCELERATED AS THE VEHICLE WAS COMING TO A STOP.  THE CONTACT PLACED THE VEHICLE IN NEUTRAL IN ORDER TO STOP THE VEHICLE.  THE DEALERSHIP HAS BEEN INFORMED.
